```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(lubridate)
```


```{r}
dnr.2018 <- read_xlsx("data/DNR_data/IowaDNR_2018_Data_Merged.xlsx") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  filter(!is.na(collected_date))%>% 
  mutate(hazard_class = if_else(
    microcystin_raw_value_ug_l > 8,
    "hazardous",
    "safe"
  ))
```

```{r}
dnr.2018 %>%
  count(hazard_class)
```

```{r}
dnr.2018 %>%
  filter(hazard_class != "safe") %>% 
  count(environmental_location) %>%
  mutate(environmental_location = 
           fct_reorder(environmental_location, n)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(n, environmental_location)) +
  geom_col() +
  labs(
    y = "Lake",
    x = "# Hazardous cases",
    title = "Viking Lake is nasty"
  ) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(
    panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
    panel.grid.major.y = element_blank()
  )
```


```{r}
dnr.2018 %>% 
  mutate(hazard_class = if_else(
    microcystin_raw_value_ug_l > 8,
    "hazardous",
    "safe"
  )) %>% 
  select(microcystin_raw_value_ug_l, hazard_class)
```


```{r}
dnr.2018 %>%
  mutate(collected_year = year(collected_date)) %>% 
  select(collected_date, collected_year) %>%
  count(collected_year)

dnr.2018 %>%
  count(year(collected_date))

dnr.2018 %>%
  filter(!is.na(collected_date)) %>%
  count(year(collected_date))
```
